Reviews.Title: Waaay better than the Swann I replaced
Reviews.Author: ebirm

} cv_mo2PLPY5GRNZOIUloadSwf_Core(swfLocation, swfWidth, swfHeight, flashVersion, bgColor, swfParams, flashParams, embedAttributes); return false; } function cv_mo2PLPY5GRNZOIUloadSwf(movieID, playerVersion) { return _cv_mo2PLPY5GRNZOIUloadSwf(movieID, playerVersion); } // ]]> var cv_mo2PLPY5GRNZOIURollOverImg = new Image(); cv_mo2PLPY5GRNZOIURollOverImg.src = "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/91E6FLAvNMS._SX320_PHcustomer-video-vignette_PIvideo-reviews-bottom,BottomLeft,0,43_OU01_PIcustomer-video-play-active,BottomLeft,130,-12_CR0,0,0,0_.png"; var cv_mo2PLPY5GRNZOIUpreplay = document.getElementById('cv_mo2PLPY5GRNZOIUpreplayImageId'); if (cv_mo2PLPY5GRNZOIUpreplay) { cv_mo2PLPY5GRNZOIUpreplay.onmouseover = function() { cv_mo2PLPY5GRNZOIUpreplay.src = "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/91E6FLAvNMS._SX320_PHcustomer-video-vignette_PIvideo-reviews-bottom,BottomLeft,0,43_OU01_PIcustomer-video-play-active,BottomLeft,130,-12_CR0,0,0,0_.png"; } cv_mo2PLPY5GRNZOIUpreplay.onmouseout = function() { cv_mo2PLPY5GRNZOIUpreplay.src = "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/91E6FLAvNMS._SX320_PHcustomer-video-vignette_PIvideo-reviews-bottom,BottomLeft,0,43_OU01_PIcustomer-video-play,BottomLeft,130,-12_CR0,0,0,0_.png"; } var node = cv_mo2PLPY5GRNZOIUpreplay.parentNode; var cv_mo2PLPY5GRNZOIUcurrentClick = node.onclick; node.onclick = function () { var head = document.getElementsByTagName("head"); if (head[0]) { var logTag = document.createElement('script'); logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo2PLPY5GRNZOIUcurrentClick) { return cv_mo2PLPY5GRNZOIUcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 0:17 MinsI live in a 2nd story apartment and installed a Swann 2.4GHz wireless that I picked up from the local hardware store about a year ago. I installed it after scaring off some would-be car thief's. I decided to replace it because one of my receivers went out and I replaced it with the standard Astak 2.4GHz wireless receiver. I was impressed with the receiver (w/remote) and so I thought I'd give these cameras a try (the Swann was very choppy and I had to mess with the brightness controls in the software I use, a lot). I use the second receiver to hook to the TV in my living room. The cameras and receiver are in the same location as when I was using the Swann.These cameras are way better than the Swann. The video that comes with this review was taken from my PC (I wire it through a Roxio RCA to USB connector) and use a freeware program to capture it (Debut). There are three walls between my computer and the cameras.Others post about bad reception because of wireless routers. I don't use one, but there are several that appear in my wireless network list on my Windows PC. To be fair, they could have changed their routers after I installed the Swann a year ago.Downside: The audio is choppy and has static. I don't use the audio; I didn't use the audio with the Swann, either. This is the reason for my "low" marks. Also, in the manual I discovered that in low light the cameras will switch to black and white. However, as you can see from the video, the b/w hasn't switched on. There is a big flood light in my parking lot which may be the reason. Color 24/7. Judge for yourself.Tip: you may need to adjust the antenna on the receiver to get the lowest amount of static. I've found that moving it about 20 degrees at a time lets you see the difference.Well worth the money. I hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, great price...but know your environment.
Reviews.Author: CJ
Reviews.Content: This is a decent set of cameras at a good price, especially compared to similar brands.  I found the cameras to be weatherproof, solid, and easy to use.Due to no fault of their own, I would HIGHLY recommend you buy the wired version if you live in an urban area and/or near too many wireless access points.  This is the primary reason behind the degradation in signal & video that cause many reviewers of wireless cams to wrongly give 1 star ratings to what are actually decent products.  You can download the free tool, Netstumbler, and use it on a laptop to see how many access points are in your neighborhood.

Reviews.Title: surveillance for home
Reviews.Author: J. Graham
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to add on to my current system, which has 2 cameras from astak. Works great like the others. It is very easy to install. I keep one extra camera on the ready for when we go for overnights or vacations because it is so convenient = the receiver plugs into any A/V port (there is always a TV wherever we go, or owe can use our portable DVD player). We have a few reception problems because of several wireless devices (phone, router), but not too bad. It would be nice if the channel could be changed on the cameras to improve reception - however, hasn't hindered our use of it so far. The picture is still clear enough. The color aspect is not significant...depends on how you use it. We monitor our kids with it. Great product overall. I highly recommend it over a baby monitor any day.

Reviews.Title: Astak CM-818 - Great Value
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This set performed exactly as it said it would. I also have a wireless router which did interfere with the signal until I simply changed the channel on the camera and then everything worked just great. One camera is about 60 feet away through three walls the other is 50 feet away through two walls and after a bit of receiver location adjusting video comes through with minimal to no distortion. Sure a wired system will produce better quality at longer distances but it comes with a much higher price. For the price offered this system did not disappoint (I would buy again). My only suggestion, if you plan to set up outside make sure you have a plan to hard wire or at least an outlet close by to plug in to as the battery feature only last a few hours at best. I ran my system through an inexpensive adapter at a local electronics store, tied it into a dedicated hidden coax cable and now I can watch security feed from any room in the house. Coupled with some inexpensive software purchased online, I can now be alerted when home or away, monitor and record audio/video from anywhere and receive emailed pictures/video of any security breach for under $200. Not Bad in my book.Hope this helps

Reviews.Title: good for daytime surveilance
Reviews.Author: Gary Mccreath
Reviews.Content: Have had these cams in use almost a month. Good for daytime surveillance. Not so much at night. They are outside and have weathered some severe storms.For the money I don't think they can be beat.

Reviews.Title: Security for a good price
Reviews.Author: Leonard Eng
Reviews.Content: For a low price at a local store that "Costless in bulk" I found this to be a bargin in wireless security. Fry's does have deals with other companies/brands but for the stats and price I just had to have it. So far it's hooked up to a DVDR and set for 6hrs and works just great. The only thing I would recomend is to get a motion sensor light also on the area being screened so that your picture is in color and not B&W.;I like this brand better than some of the other companies because of the price and features. BTW I do also use Web cam for security monitoring.Cheers.

Reviews.Title: Blurry picture + lots of interference and static = disappointment
Reviews.Author: A. de Wolf
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera as a gift. Taking the cameras, receiver and remote control out of the box we were impressed with the sturdiness and quality feel of the products, although right away the antenna of one of the two cameras broke off easily and we couldn't get it back.Unfortunately we could not get the cameras to work properly. First we only got black on the screen, no picture whatsoever. The camera has ridiculously tiny switches inside the wire connector that you can use to change to 4 different frequencies. You need a needle to change them, they are so tiny. After trying the other frequencies we did see the occasional static on the screen. It turned out that we had interference from a wireless 2.4 Ghz phone in the house. Without the phone we did eventually get a picture, but the picture was very very blurry and still lots of static and lines. We returned it to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Save your money
Reviews.Author: T. McGettigan
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as an option to a driveway alarm.  I have a home office, and have an obstructed view of my driveway.  I really liked the idea of being able to use Batteries vs Hard wiring the cameras.  Unfortunately these cameras have a working range from the wireless receiver of about 5 feet.  After that lots of static, and poor picture quality.  I followed the instructions and tried every frequency but the same static poor quality image continued. Although, I bought this one due to the battery option on the camera, I even tried the A/C adapter thinking it could be a power problem.  The box says 150-300 range (line of site) HA.  Not even 10 feet before noticeable loss of image 20 feet worthless.

Reviews.Title: This is a HOAX
Reviews.Author: Totally Unsatisfied!!!!!
Reviews.Content: This is a HOAX this product it is not as its description! I bought it and it did not work at all! I tested the camera 2 feet away from the receiver and the image was totally blurred. I could not distinguish faces or shapes! I had to return it. I paid for shipping $13.00 and the seller ended charging me a re-stocking fee of $8 some Dollars. I believe this is the way they make money out of the re-stocking fees. THIS PRODUCT DID NOT WORK IT was not my fault I could not use it. I LOST MONEY!

Reviews.Title: Not a good choice
Reviews.Author: M. Torres "Avidreader2007"
Reviews.Content: Cheap hardware, hard to record to a computer,  ok if you want to watch the room your in on your tv. The camera reception is poor at best, and I'm in a small house reception at 30 foot is poor with interior doors open. I'm Removing and installing an ip system.

Reviews.Title: Horrible customer service
Reviews.Author: D. Faust
Reviews.Content: The camera seems to work okay but pray you don't have any problems.The images received from the camera looked fine in good lighting.  Through a couple walls it picked up a pretty good signal.It did interfere with my wireless router (no internet while the cameras were on) and has no signal adjustment.  Had I kept it I maybe would have been able to change the signal on my router to resolve the issue, but I never got that far.The remote that comes with the unit did not work on my unit.  Not a big deal as I doubt I'd use the remote, but you need the remote to program which channels to cycle through and which to skip.  Since it is a 4 channel receiver and a 2 camera kit it cycles through all four channels.  You need to use the remote to program out the unused channels.I tried for quite awhile to get the remote to work.  I put a new battery in it, I tried it from different angles, different distances, everything.  Yes, I removed the pull tab and the plastic covering, the remote does not work at all.I contacted Astak via their website and told them me remote didn't work.  I asked if they could just send me a new remote rather then have me send it back to Amazon.  The remote is a cheap 5-6 button flimsy plastic thing so I figured that would be far cheaper for them to replace.  Astak replied to me with a PDF of directions on how to use the remote???  I then called to talk to someone and after 15 minutes on hold and two transfers I ended up talking to the same guy that sent me the remote use instructions.  I asked him if he could just send me a new remote.  He insisted I emailed him proof I purchased the camera first???  Really?  Like people try to scam you out of these cheapy remotes?  Anyway, I emailed the proof (replied to his message to me) and asked that he confirm he would send out a new remote.  No response.  I emailed twice more for confirmation and still no response.  I considered calling again but at that point it really wasn't worth the time I'd spend on hold, only to hope I could work out the interference problem so I waited a week for a response or a remote to show up and then just returned the whole thing.

Reviews.Title: Great Cameras for the price
Reviews.Author: Ksyrium "Ask me any questions you may have on...
Reviews.Content: These cameras for the price are amazing. They do transfer video and audio, it is clear if you're in a reasonable distance. Our camera is about 200 feet away.The Cameras themselves are compact and small. They do need a power source, so you can go 9 volt battery or plugged into an outlet. Ours have been outside for a month now and no complaints yet. They are weatherproof. It has rained and we saw no difference. Night vision also looks great.Two bad things are we wish the color was more vibrant. The picture color is kind of dull. Also Auto switching on the receiver, we wish could be set to two cameras not go through all 4 channels and give us 2 blank screens.Install is easy plug and play. Give these cameras a shot before spending a lot more.

Reviews.Title: Junk!
Reviews.Author: mike buck
Reviews.Content: This product is junk! I don't write to many reviews on products but with this one in particular, you may want to research a bit more before purchasing. Then again, this was made in china so your expectations should be met with their lack of quality..

Reviews.Title: Worthless
Reviews.Author: Cody Barth "Cody"
Reviews.Content: Ny wide and I bought this system because a family member car got token into. When we set the camera up in te same room as the receiver the picture was mediocre at best. It looked like a 1980's home video. Also, in order to get a static free picture I literally had to touch the camera and receiver antena together. We spend $120 on the product after tax and would not recomend this product even if you found it for $50. DON'T BUY.

Reviews.Title: Security camera works great
Reviews.Author: Smths
Reviews.Content: We use this camera as a granny cam for my mother with altzheimers who likes to wander.  My husband works in his garage and this lets him work and keep an eye on mom at the same time.  The night vision is great.  Once in a while weather affects the signal but we think it was well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Can You Spell Worthless
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This has to be the al time worse purchase I have ever made.  Going on some of the reviews, thought this might be a good replacement for my "First Alert" camera that went out due to the heat.  What a mistake.  After hooking up the two cameras (all components in the same room) noticed static lines on the monitor.  Even the 900MHz First Alert system had a better picture quality then this system.  Looked in the brochure, and called the service number.  All they did was try to convince me the problem was in the way I had the system setup.  It doesn't take a Rocket Scientist to setup a wireless home securtiy camera, and my job title is Rocket Scientist.  So save yourself alot of trouble and buy another system.

Reviews.Title: Too bad reception even in the same room
Reviews.Author: Suburban
Reviews.Content: I am no happy with this camera, it do not have enough range, only 7 feet, this is a bad toy; definitely a lot worse than I expected; when I turn on 2 cameras, the second cause interference in the signal on the receiver, and is no possible to obtain good quality of signal in the receiver, I adjust de knob, but this don't work very well.

Reviews.Title: This is a joke Camera, read reviews before you buy this!!!
Reviews.Author: Patricia Vaughan
Reviews.Content: Not happy with this product at all. I usually never bother to write a review but I feel that I must warn potential buyers of this product, to save you the headache this will cause you in trying to make this camera work and then to only have to return it. When I got this package I was so excited to finally be able to catch the crook that is trying to poison my dogs and so I was anxious to getting this camera up, I have followed the instruction which it doesn't take a rocket scientist to do and as soon as I turned the receiver on there were lines interfering with the picture. I have  tried to change the channels on the camera itself and still no clear picture. the only time it somehow worked with just a few lines in the picture was when I had the receiver placed right next to the camera itself! What a joke!! It states on the box that the Wireless Camera from the receiver transmission distance is 150-300 feet (line of sight, reduced through obstacles such as walls) It wouldn't even work while the camera was only 5 feet away! I had 1 wall between the receiver and the camera which is a must because I cannot place the receiver outside and it still did not work.. Also the video/audio out cable is so short that you cant even place the receiver anywhere but right in front of the tv !!  Sorry for the bad review but a baby monitor works better then this !! I am in the process of returning this to the seller, we will see if I have better luck getting this returned and If I am liable for the shipping cost !!! which from reading all the other returned camera reviews I am !!

Reviews.Title: No good
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Yes this was the worst thing i paid for on Amazon, i pretty much had to have the cameras right next  to the receiver to get a clear picture. It also did not come with everything that it was suppose to come with, i had to go out and purchase them.

Reviews.Title: Crap item
Reviews.Author: Austin Anderson "Austin"
Reviews.Content: I ORDER ASTAK WIRELESS SECURITY CAMERAS, ONE WAS DIED ON ARRIVAL, ONE PRODUCED POOR VIDEO IMAGES. IT WAS WIRELESS JUNK, DO NOT PURCHASE THEM!

Reviews.Title: Astak Camera
Reviews.Author: elico
Reviews.Content: I like this product works fine I can add an addition camera of the same company I can control each of the camera I am happy for the order , the product arrive in the time

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Good camera does very good in the cold.It does very well at night and day I would recomend this product.

Reviews.Title: THIS camera is BAD
Reviews.Author: Abdulla al orini
Reviews.Content: When i try the camera i was completely unsatisfied. This product is  a wast of money to but. VERY BAD SIGNAL. IM only 10 feet and the signal is not clear in the morning, and in the night its even worse. i wish i have saved the money i paid for some other thing. :(

Reviews.Title: Junk! Spend more, get something better, be happier!
Reviews.Author: Ryan - AZ
Reviews.Content: I bought this after I was a victim of a property crime. Thought this would work out nice but it's garbage. Interference like crazy unless the receiver is practically on top on the camera. Wish I could send this back to them but I'm beyond the return date. Bought this http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B003LNZ1L6/ref=oh_details_o00_s00_i00 to replace it. Does a much better job.

Reviews.Title: surveillance cameras
Reviews.Author: scott
Reviews.Content: Bought these to add to cameras i all ready have. Installation was very easy. They work ok but video quality is a little low and night vision range is shorter than my other cameras. Also the image sometimes freezes and i have to unplug them to reset. Far from the best cameras but better than nothing. One nice thing about these is the reciever has 4 channels and the cameras can be set to any of the 4 channels. So i could use them with the two cameras i already was using.

Reviews.Title: Look good but not for practical use
Reviews.Author: Vijj
Reviews.Content: i have ordered this product . this is 1st time i print return label within a hour of trying this product1. Video quality is not good even when camera are very near to receiver. if there is a wall between camera and receiver then there is no signal2. image fliker a lot .3. remote didn't work for me .this might be just me normal defect.only good thing about this is . camera really looks good

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: john frye
Reviews.Content: one camera stopped working  in about a month. and do not know where to ship it to , so they can repair it

Reviews.Title: Not good with wireless connections
Reviews.Author: E. T.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this system because I have seen it being used at a friends' home. After receiving my system and connecting it. I could no longer use  my wireless laptop computers.  I changed the channel on my wireless router and this did not work.. I can only use my wireless computers if I disconnect the security system, so this system is of no use to me. I would only recommend this security system to someone without wireless connections.

Reviews.Title: Astak Wireless Security Camera(CM-818C2)
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: One camera worked fine.  The other is too dark and cannot be adjusted.  It is a package deal and we cannot send back just one bad camera.  Will buy at the store next time.  Have never had this to happen before when ordering from Amazon.  Disappointed to say the least.  Up until this order, have had good results with ordering this same camera in the past.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: Aristargazer
Reviews.Content: It was easy installation, didn't take long at all. The only drawback I saw was the one I installed outside facing the parking lot of my apt complex pointing down at my car, with no lights out in the parking lot, during the night, you cannot see a thing, but my front door with the porch light, you can see everything out there at night. I hooked it up to a little tv with a vcr and started recording. I am happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: Not what is seems.
Reviews.Author: Ronald Farley
Reviews.Content: This product states it will transmitt up to 300 feet. In truth it will not transmitt over 20 feet. I am very disapionted in the procuct and would not recomend it unless you want to us it for inside. I thnk this is what it is really intended for use.

Reviews.Title: the cameras
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Medeiros "jenniferm"
Reviews.Content: They were suppose to be water proof and they were not as soon as it rained they were ruined I am very disappointed .

Reviews.Title: security cameras
Reviews.Author: Ms Cici "easy music"
Reviews.Content: camera are okay, however, view of the camera on my monitor that is not near the adapter is not very clear at all.  glad I didn't order the four camera, because apparently I would only get a clear view of one and poor quality vision for the other three.

Reviews.Title: it is ok
Reviews.Author: Ahmed
Reviews.Content: this is the best I found for it's price , it doesn't work well if the receiver far from it or between walls

Reviews.Title: POS
Reviews.Author: james j.
Reviews.Content: very cheap system,1 camera works ok , the other is always full of static lines, changed all feqs, and still the same, cant record to a computor would not recomend this to anybody, also amazon has this listed as a $269 system when if you look at the manufacturers website it only a $129 system, amazon wants to make you think your getting a great deal ,when in reality your not

Reviews.Title: stay away
Reviews.Author: jory lopez
Reviews.Content: ok I should have listen to everyone else on here its made with plastic and we all no plastic breaks very easy especially when your trying to tighten the screw on it to set up the camera, also if you get a lot of storms your way you mite want to get a different system because the storm interferes with the system/ picture really really bad

Reviews.Title: works good
Reviews.Author: Aaron Madden
Reviews.Content: Not the best quality, but good for the price. I temp. set up at different locations to try it out. The kids have fun with it. For the money, its alot of fun for my kids to play with.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Mike Canton
Reviews.Content: Great Works better every time, I can keep an eye on the children playing in there room I really like it

Reviews.Title: Wireless Security Camera provides peace of mind
Reviews.Author: Thomas K. Swain "Ken Swain"
Reviews.Content: This Wireless Security Camera system provides peace of mind to my 85 year old mother. Now we can see whether someone is knocking on her windows or if it is some other noise disturbing her sleep and feeling of security.

Reviews.Title: During Day Light It'll get the job done.
Reviews.Author: IGottaKnow
Reviews.Content: Product arrived on time, was nib.  During the day, images are clear, but when dark, as long as you have a good strong source of light, you may have better luck than I did.  Even with street and a porch light, nothing could be seen at night tme.  Spoke to a friend about the images and his experience with a more expensive system was about the same as mine.

Reviews.Title: faulty
Reviews.Author: Joe Nooyen
Reviews.Content: one of the cameras was not working at all probably loose wire it would work only when you jiggled the wire

Reviews.Title: Used for a backup camera
Reviews.Author: Harry Carter
Reviews.Content: Seems to work ok. It is line of sight only, if you walk in front of it you will block the reception. For the price they work as I expected. I would recommend them. I will use one for the back-up camera and one for a spare.

Reviews.Title: Astak Wireless Security Camera (CM-818C2)
Reviews.Author: John E. Heckelman
Reviews.Content: Good deal! The cams are just right for tracking our two little Yorkies running around the backyard. Easy to install and operate. Did run into one problem with one of the cams. It was only showing a black and white, foggy looking picture. Found out by checking other reviews of this cam was that a little catch in the cam that's associated with the infrared operation was stuck. It was recommended to move the cam in a horizontal motion gently several times. Amazingly, this reset it to normal color operation in daylight. No prolems since. Happy Camper.

Reviews.Title: home security useage
Reviews.Author: Cameron Castle
Reviews.Content: well as far as working they work that they do but if you plan on useing this around your home the signal range isn't the greatest if u have a muti-story home such as i.....i would peffer to have my monitor in my bed room on the 2nd floor but i have to keep the monitor in another room in my home close to my frount door camera and garage camera.....it works that way pretty well unless my dog gets in the way from antena and camera lose's picture......3 stars will def b out on the look for camera with better signal so i can keep an eye on my home from my bed! :)

Reviews.Title: Cheapos
Reviews.Author: Arkansawhillbilly
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for. I have eight of these camera's over the years and up close they are great, but at any distance you really cant tell what is in the monitor. The receivers always go bad, have had to replace these several times. I would say they might be worth half the price paid and it would be considered a fair deal.

Reviews.Title: to much interferance
Reviews.Author: robert parker
Reviews.Content: i was so exited that i was getting something to help protect my family but when i set it up it was all static on the tv the cameras was only 10ft away. so i pulled one down from outside and it only work inches away from the receiver not worth my time nor my money i will never recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: astak wireless cams JUNK!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: hardesty
Reviews.Content: I bought these from wal-mart a couple months ago and there junk horrible cameras they only reach 2-4 foot from transmitter but they claim 200ft plus costomer service is bad they wont call me back and wont answer my emails dont buy go with a better company.

Reviews.Title: The worst customer service bar none
Reviews.Author: hillbillygoat
Reviews.Content: Fairly good picture and night vision. Well worth the money, but if you have a problem forget it. I had a problem with mine. Tried for a year to get replaced. I e-mailed their tech support and in a year they responded to me charge it four hours. Sent email back and no response. Now my warranty ended. They have no phone. Never in my life I have been treated like this. DO NOT BUY ASTAK CAMERA.IT IS SOME CHINESE JUNK WITH THE WORST TECH SUPPORT.

Reviews.Title: Interference
Reviews.Author: John D. Jordan
Reviews.Content: I get noise interference so I have to mute my monitor to use it. I was able to add another camera from another system to the receiver and added to my home security.

Reviews.Title: It is junk!!! Buyer beware!!!
Reviews.Author: josephshaw
Reviews.Content: It was a lousy wireless security system. The cameras have to be next to the receiver or the picture quailty is hard to figure and snowy. DO not buy this junk, it's not worth one coin.

Reviews.Title: Astak Wireless Security Cam
Reviews.Author: Wolfeden
Reviews.Content: Received my "Security Camera System" and immediately installed it.  It was extremely easy to connect to my TV and see the images that the cameras captured.  Pictures were very clear during the daytime hours.  However, night pictures are much less desirable.  Even when I added a security light to boost the light in the area being "watched" by the camera, the images are not very good.  I'm not sure you could identify anyone captured in this image.Additionally, I have not been able to locate any "recording" device by which I could record images seen by the cameras.  At present, all images are live - not recorded.  I would like to be able to record images so I could review scenes when I'm not present to look at live pictures.

Reviews.Title: looks like snow on trees and grass
Reviews.Author: pc
Reviews.Content: The product set up is easy gave a 2 because there is no way to get the picture to show true color--grass and leaves on tree show as if they have snow on them--even through they are very green--called about problem told it was because it had a strong inf-red for night vision--so couldn't be corrected--I have had other night vision cameras and never had this problem.  WILL MOST LIKELY SEND PRODUCT BACK.

Reviews.Title: GOOD PRODUCT BUT HAD TO RETURN AS THE UNIT WAS MISSING CONNECTING CABLE TO COMPUTER SCREEN
Reviews.Author: jk
Reviews.Content: GOOD PRODUCT BUT HAD TO RETURN UNIT DUE TO MISSING CABLE WHICH CAN CONNECT THIS UNIT TO MY COMPUTER SCREEN.

Reviews.Title: Security cameras
Reviews.Author: Milliganboy
Reviews.Content: These cameras are okay however there are some things about them that are misleading! They will not transmit but about 60'ft. without lost of signal strength. If you use a wireless Router you cannot have it between the line of the camera and the transmitter without severe interference. If you get a good signal, the pic is very good! Very easy to install.

Reviews.Title: swweeeet
Reviews.Author: Justin "Justin k power"
Reviews.Content: theses are great for cameras around the house but not for in a tree or in a store but thres better

Reviews.Title: EXCELNTE COMPRA, GRACIAS
Reviews.Author: angel
Reviews.Content: no tengo mucho que decir. las camaras funcionan muy bien, me parece un precio justo por el producto, muchas gracias... soy de venezuela

Reviews.Title: Good price - poor performance
Reviews.Author: C. Tucker
Reviews.Content: This one got what I paid for... was trying to find simple wireless cameras to view front door and driveway while working at home.  Reception is extremely poor, based on manufacture comments must be picking up interference from someother transmission device.  I turned off (unplugged) everything around the house that MIGHT have have simlar frequency, wireless router, wireless phones, even turned off all cell phones, unplugged all TVs and fans with last try and used a simple DVD/monitor device for car on the last try to see if helped... nothing - screen still appeared as if you were watching a scrambled channel on cable.  I am big on performance with quality construction, seemed like very good construction overall - NOT HAPPY WITH THIS DEVICE PERFORMANCE AT ALL!!!! *IF YOU WANT TO WATCH SCRAMBLED PICTURE OF FRONT DOOR - THIS IS IT.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: WheelChair Man
Reviews.Content: These cameras are small and easy to install, the option of using a power cord or battery is a great option for placement of the cameras.  The only down side is the not having a multiple camera option you can only see one camera at a time.

Reviews.Title: Terrible wireless reception
Reviews.Author: J. Carter "J.man"
Reviews.Content: Every time a car goes by, every time you pass in front of the signal, every time the camera moves you get a ton of static. I have had this camera for well over a month now and it literally has me walking on eggshells not to place any furniture or metal objects between the path of signal between the camera and the receiver. Get ready to get the tin foil out and play rabbit ear games to get the signal to come in clear, because its that bad.To add to this, night vision is horrible, I get random static from what I believe to be a neighbor's wireless phone, and even the daytime picture with no static isn't quality enough to where I could make out somebodys face and it certainly wouldnt be enough to charge anybody with any kind of crime. This camera is basically only good for one thing: a toy. Thats it. It will show you when somebody is approaching, and thats it. Save your money, indeed.

Reviews.Title: Wireless
Reviews.Author: D. Craig
Reviews.Content: If you can get the cameras and reciever in locations that are compatible with each other, the signal isn't that bad. It's a 2.4Ghz wireless system, so if you have older 2.4 cordless phones or a 2.4 wireless router system in your house you can expect to have interference with this system. I can't use the sound feature on this because of that. And if you have too many walls between the camera and receiver, the picture won't come in.Great if you're only using it for close range, as in no more than the next room.

Reviews.Title: expected more
Reviews.Author: Aladdin
Reviews.Content: I had a wire security camera prior and found that this wireless wasn't nearly as good. My old cameras had a much wider view and had better night vision. It's unbelievable how the signal breaks up going through just a few walls. Except for the problems of running new wire (the old was not compatable) I wouldn't recommend any wireless units unless it has no or minimal wall barriers.

ProductInfo.Features:
CMOS wireless security camera set Weatherproof Night Vision Clear color image (380 TV line resolution)
Wireless receiver supports up to 4 cameras Remote control included Built-in microphone and switchable channel
ProductInfo.Name: Astak Wireless Security Camera (CM-818C2)
